about_the_game:
It is a paid additional content of the latest work of the strategy war simulation series "Daisenryaku SSB" (Windows® 11/10 / 8.1).
With the theme of "Hot summer in the Far East in 2022", this product is a set of a scenario map "Takeshima Battle" that depicts the clash between Japan and South Korea over Takeshima, and additional weapons that have not appeared in the main story of Japan and the United States. ..

◆ Newly added scenario "Battle of Takeshima" ◆

The battle between Japan and South Korea.

◆ List of newly added weapons ◆


・ A-10 Thunderbolt II
・ AH-1 Cobra
・ UH-1 Iroquois
・ Type 74 tank
・ Type 73 armored car
・ M113
・ Striker ATGM
・ Type 19 wheeled self-propelled howitzer
・ HIMARS
・ Type 11 short-range ground-to-air guided bullet
・ Type 93 short-range surface-to-air missile
・ Asahi
・ Kongo
・ Murasame
・ Zumwalt
・ Hyuga
・ Oyashio
・ Sea Wolf
detailed_description:
It is a paid additional content of the latest work of the strategy war simulation series "Daisenryaku SSB" (Windows® 11/10 / 8.1).
With the theme of "Hot summer in the Far East in 2022", this product is a set of a scenario map "Takeshima Battle" that depicts the clash between Japan and South Korea over Takeshima, and additional weapons that have not appeared in the main story of Japan and the United States. ..

◆ Newly added scenario "Battle of Takeshima" ◆

The battle between Japan and South Korea.

◆ List of newly added weapons ◆


・ A-10 Thunderbolt II
・ AH-1 Cobra
・ UH-1 Iroquois
・ Type 74 tank
・ Type 73 armored car
・ M113
・ Striker ATGM
・ Type 19 wheeled self-propelled howitzer
・ HIMARS
・ Type 11 short-range ground-to-air guided bullet
・ Type 93 short-range surface-to-air missile

・ Zumwalt
・ Hyuga
・ Oyashio
・ Sea Wolf
name: 大戦略SSB - 竹島攻防戦セット

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows®11/10/8.1
  • Processor: Core i3 and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows®11/10/8.1
  • Processor: Core i3 and above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: It is a paid additional content of the latest work of the strategy war simulation series "Daisenryaku SSB" (Windows® 7, 8, 10). The additional paid content is a set of a scenario map with the theme of "Hot summer in the Far East in 2022" and weapons that have not appeared in the main story.
